Dice Game II: Press the button to play the game!
At the top of the Tower you find an abondoned treasure containing 250 coins
During your trip through the Crater, you stumble and lose 100 coins
Upon reaching the Palace gates, you are rewarded with 100 coins as a stipend for your journey
While travelling the Cold Desert, you stumble across a merchant and buy firewood for 20 coins
In the Walled City you tell tales of your travels, and the locals reward you with 180 coins
You find a peaceful Monastery, where you find a place to rest
In the Black Cave you are robbed by bandits, and they steal 70 of your coins
You reach some Huts In The Mountains, where you help the inhabitants and earn 60 coins
You reach the grand Werewall and make a deal with the werewolfs granting you an extra turn in return for 80 coins
In order to cross The Pit, you have to pay a bridge toll of 50 coins
You found gold in the mountains and sell it for 650, you're rich!
